# cccLLM

<!-- badges: start -->

<!-- badges: end -->

This package contains a collection of datasets about the Colombian Constitutional Court collected with the help of Large Language Models.

## Installation

You can install the development version of cccLLM from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("acastroaraujo/cccLLM")
```
